programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Joan Embery (2/20/74)
programme.desc: Animal trainer Joan Embery introduces Johnny to a wide variety of animals.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Jennifer Grey (2/2/90)
programme.desc: Jennifer Grey talks about her famous parents and Carl Reiner talks about his famous friends.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Dabney Coleman (5/2/90)
programme.desc: Vodka and Russia are twin themes on this fun episode with Yakov Smirnoff and Dabney Coleman.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Danny DeVito (3/12/87)
programme.desc: Danny DeVito appears on the couch, as well as Rohan Varavadekar and Calvin Trillin.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Danny Thomas (1/20/76)
programme.desc: Comedian Danny Thomas chats working with fellow funny man Jonathan Winters and his latest show on NBC.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '60s - James Garner (9/13/91)
programme.desc: James talks series, “Man Of The People,” biggest career clinkers, TV Hall Of Fame, and public speaking fear.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Lauren Bacall (6/23/83)
programme.desc: Lauren Bacall talks about her new play, life in LA and quitting smoking…for the fifth time.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Carnac (3/3/82)
programme.desc: Harvey Korman regales Johnny with a story about Tim Conway taking his pants off in public.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Peter Fonda (1/4/85)
programme.desc: Actor/screenwriter Peter Fonda opens up about being compared to his father and sister.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '90s - Ally Sheedy (6/9/83)
programme.desc: Richard Pryor discusses his latest film, "Superman," and seeing Ronald Reagan. Then Ally Sheedy stops by.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '50s - Bob Hope (10/31/80)
programme.desc: The inimitable Bob Hope offers his 2 cents on the Reagan – Carter debate andsleeping in the Lincoln bedroom.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Joan Embery (8/15/91)
programme.desc: A two-headed snake is brought to the show by Joan Embery. Dennis Hopper also joins the fun.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of The Mighty Carson Art Players (5/8/87)
programme.desc: Paul Reiser talks about getting a sensitive body part stuck in an exercise machine.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Richard Pryor (5/4/77)
programme.desc: Richard Pryor chats about his California-style divorce and Chevy Chase discusses his Gerald Ford impression.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Joan Embery (1/18/90)
programme.desc: Animal wrangler Joan Embery brings a rare Canadian Lynx to the show, and actor Ron Silver also visits.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Mel Brooks (12/15/83)
programme.desc: Finally, the world has proof that Johnny's desk backdrop isn't real when Mel Brooks reveals all!

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Eddie Murphy (6/24/83)
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy discusses his hero Richard Pryor, and talks about his film Trading Places.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Dinah Shore (11/10/77)
programme.desc: Fellow talk show host and chart-topping vocalist Dinah Shore sings 2 of her hits.
